ygData.subject: Hunting grounds
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail fellow adventures of Mithaniel Marr. I am currently in a party of 4 (average Level 14) and was wondering a nice place to go for experience and loot.
ygData.messageBody:
Hail fellow adventures of Mithaniel Marr.

I am currently in a party of 4 (average Level 14)
and was wondering a nice place to go for
experience and loot. Blackburrow and Paw are
a little below our level except for the few spawns
of Commanders, Captains, and the Rex brothers
but the trains associated with these dungeons
and the amount of people camping in them are
a huge deterrant. We have been thinking about
tackling the minotaurs in the Beholder Maze or
maybe even a trip down to Upper Guk. Any
advice would be greatly appreciated.

Angarth, Warrior of the Wolf, 15 Tier
"Periissem ni Periisem"
